meanings.definition: In better health or physical condition.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables can help you become healthier.
meanings.sent2: She chose to exercise regularly to feel healthier.
meanings.sent3: The salad looked so much healthier than the greasy burger.
meanings.sent4: After the workout, she felt like a healthier version of herself.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air and sunshine made her feel instantly healthier.

meanings.definition: Showing improvement in health or physical condition.
meanings.sent1: His skin looked healthier after using the new skincare products.
meanings.sent2: The plant appeared healthier after being watered regularly.
meanings.sent3: The old car seemed to get healthier with each repair.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a healthier sight after the weeds were removed.
meanings.sent5: The smile on her face showed a healthier outlook on life.
